alert.note: Alert for Lake; Lincoln; Minnehaha; Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 1:56PM MST until December 13 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of around one quarter of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Iowa and east central and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Isolated power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. The hazardous conditions could impact this evening`s and Tuesday morning`s commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of freezing drizzle continue through the evening. Freezing rain will develop after midnight. As temperatures warm Tuesday morning freezing rain will change to rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
